subject: Franks box
author: Michael
full_text: New to ghost hunting.  I have actually gotten involved with a group who does this now.  We have captured a few EVP's and it's just insane when you first hear them.   I came across some directions for building a Frank's box, and was wondering 1)how well do they work?  2)does anybody have a full parts list of what I would need to build one?   I don't want to do just the hacked radio shack version.   I would rather build my own from scratch.   Just curious though.  Any help would be appreciated.
